message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $110. I think it would be very valuable to you.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product, but I believe I can find it elsewhere for a lower price. I am willing to pay $95 for the product.
Thanks for the offer, Bob.  I understand your position, but I can't go as low as $95. Could you do $105?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. After considering the value of the product and my budget, I am able to offer $100 for the product.
